Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory670.jpg'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: 'On the early evening streets, a large performance has just ended. The spectators disperse into groups that go in each and every way.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: "This is where you and Ishmael agreed to meet after the performance, except she's nowhere to be seen now."}
{2: 'Did she... get lost?', 3: '25', 4: 'Ishmael?', 5: '25'}
{3: 'You call her name twice, but get no response.'}
{3: 'She probably got lost in the crowd somewhere...'}
{3: "You try calling Ishmael's terminal, but she doesn't pick up. She probably can't even hear her terminal over the noises."}
{3: "Since the venue isn't even that big, you decide to go and look for her yourself."}
{3: 'You retrace your steps, trying to find the path Ishmael might have taken.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory668.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory668.jpg'}
{3: "There's a path decorated with flowers and another with evergreen grass... and you believe she most likely went down the flower path."}
{3: "This street sells Constellia's specialty snacks, while that one offers milk tea-flavored electrolyte solutions... You choose the street with the milk tea electrolyte solutions."}
{3: 'And after that...'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiStoryBlackPassScene.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory783.jpg'}
{3: 'You wind through several narrow alleys, following the path you believe Ishmael has taken. As you round the last wall, the view suddenly opens up before you.'}
{3: "It's the sea."}
{3: 'And there she is, sitting at a corner table. A mechanoid employee of the small shop has just delivered a milk tea-flavored electrolyte solution and a cup of regular milk tea.'}
{2: 'Did you know I was coming?', 3: '47'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I wasn't really paying attention, and I didn't do any simulations.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I just had this feeling... that you'd probably get here around this time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Without question.', 3: '52', 4: "Right on time, wasn't I?", 5: '51'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "...That's right, you found me right on time.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Perfect timing. The festivities outside are almost over. How about we rest here for a while?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She extends her hand, inviting you to join her.'}
{2: 'Without question.', 3: '58', 4: 'If you insist.', 5: '58'}
{3: 'The horizon slowly erases the last traces of sunset glow as the tide gradually rises. The two of you leave the corner cafe and wander aimlessly along the beach.'}
{3: 'Ishmael suddenly bends down and picks up a peculiarly colored seashell from the sand.'}
{2: 'Is that a seashell?'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I really like this color.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Night falls, and against the deep blue seascape, only the soft sunset glow of the shell in her hand remains and glimmers faintly.'}
{2: 'Quite a rare color indeed.', 3: '69', 4: 'Like the sunset glow.', 5: '69'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Yes... like the sunset glow.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She carefully brushes the grains of sand from the shell and holds it up, seemingly trying to capture the last traces of sunset glow from the sky upon its surface.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Back home... there used to be an incredibly beautiful place.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "That's where I saw... the most magnificent sunset glow.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Ishmael's eyes seem to be smiling as she looks at you."}
{2: 'Your homeland?', 3: '79', 4: 'The sunset glow?', 5: '79'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Yes, it's a very distant place now... I'll take you there to see the sunset glow someday when I can.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Yes, and that's where I saw... the most magnificent sunset glow.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'She repeats those words, gazing at the shell in her hand with nostalgia.'}
{2: "I'd love to see it, too.", 3: '85'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I'm sure we'll get to see it... someday.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ishmael tucks the shell into her pocket, then turns her gaze toward the distant sea.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory785.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory785.jpg'}
{3: 'The sea horizon swallows the last streak of color from the sky—'}
{2: 'Looks like the day is calling it a day.', 3: '94'}
{3: 'Ishmael puts on a curious smile, then turns and gently traces her finger through the air—'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1076.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1076.jpg'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTempleBattle/FxUiTempleBattleYanhuan01.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTempleBattle/FxUiTempleBattleYanhuan02.prefab', 2: '3'}
{3: 'A sharp whistle pierces the air, and in the pitch-black night, vibrant fireworks once again light up the sky.'}
{2: 'Woah, check that out!', 3: '108', 4: "I didn't know they had events like this, too.", 5: '108'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTempleBattle/FxUiTempleBattleYanhuan01.prefab'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiTempleBattle/FxUiTempleBattleYanhuan02.prefab'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory785.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.5'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory785.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'This beach is the perfect place when you want to see things at night.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Looks like... the night has only just begun.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Under the intimate veil of night, amid the cool breeze of early spring, Ishmael moves closer and takes your hand.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Are you not?', 4: '1'}
